item.source: How do i change quest points to pkpoints?

item.title: How do i change quest points to pkpoints?
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

Alright, I can help you, but, this is going to be very limited. Go to your client.java and search for whatever is at the top of the quest menu. (Like, “Testscape Quests” or whatever) Once here, you should see something that will indicate QP. You must figure out what the thing is that declares PK point values. (Look for PK points, it should be like,

 +"playername"+ "has just killed "+victim+" and now has "+pkpoints+""

The part where the pkpoints is, that is what you put in your qp spot.
Now, look what void the quest thing is in. Should be like,

public void questmenu()

Now, whatever it says, below the message where it tells your PK points, that we looked at earlier, put this…

voidnamehere();

This makes the PK points in the QP spot update every time you get a kill.
Sorry this isnt more clear, but, its the best I can do with no source refrence, or server base.

Read full topic
